title: Missing Snow Day Scutller Icon
body:
I gifted my friend gomeznap Full Metal Rammus on 12/25/2016
That falls with in the dates of SnowDown 2016 to my understanding, as the website says that the event will last from 12/14/16 - 1/9/17 
The FAQ states "Please allow up until January 23, 2017 at 23:59 PT for the Poro King Icon to appear in your account." does that go for other icons as well?
Any help is appreciated
Jason

replies.body: Icons will still be distributed even after the event, so the goods will come.  We aim to have eligible icons sent out by the 23rd, including the Poro King icon.  Hang tight until then!

Is there a chance that the system for distibuting achievement icon during an event change in a near futur?

I don't know for other but, this is the second event in a raw that I accomplish what I need to do to get the icon (win a doombot, gift a friend) the first day of the event and that I receive the icon way after the event end (still waiting for scuttler too^^)

It is kinda sad to not be able to custom the profil with the event icon during the event, even more when it's an achievement icon.
Imo, the shurima system, where you unlocked yourself the icon after each ascension achievement, was way more rewarding than the actual lotery :s

Yeah I don't know why it isn't like an achievement system in other games where as soon as you fulfill the requirement you get the icon. Unless they've encountered problems with people cheating the system somehow
